STD:EMAIL_NO_SEND: The email could not be sent at this time, try again later!
STD:PASS_RESET_CHECK_MAIL: You or someone else has reset your password! Please check your email for more information!
STD:BANNED_ACC: An administrator has banned your account! You should be aware of this already.
STD:GOOGLE_AUTH_ERROR: There was an error communicating with Google!
NO_ACC: You don't have an account? Click here.
NO_CHANGE_PW: You don't want to change your password? Click here.
HAVE_ACC_ALREADY: Already have an account? Click here.
EMAIL_EXPLAIN: We need this for you to confirm your account.
VALIDATOR_EMAIL: Email must have the following format: email@domain
MAIL_CONFRIM_HEADER: We have sent you an email!
MAIL_CONFRIM_DESC: You will receive an email in your inbox that contains a
MAIL_CONFRIM_CLICK: to verify your account. Click on the link provided to verify your account!
MAIL_CONFRIM_RESET_PASS_CLICK: to reset your password. Click on the link provided to reset your password!
MAIL_CONFRIM_NOT_RECIEVED: The mail didn't arrive yet? Click here and we will send you a new one!
ALREADY_CONFIRMED: Click here to go to sign in page.
ACC_CONFIRMED_DESC: Your account has been confirmed, thank you!
ACC_CONFIRMED_REDIRECT: We will redirect you to the login page now!
ACC_CONFIRMED_DESC_ERR: Unfortunately we're not able to confirm your account.
ACC_CONFIRMED_REDIRECT_ERR: Please, check your recieved e-mail and try the link again.
RESEND_EMAIL_CONFRIM_ACC: Do you want us to resend you the email? Click here.
PASS_RESET_DESC: We need your username to know for what account you're trying to change the password.
PASS_RESET_DESC_SUCCESS: You have successfully changed your password, we will now redirect you to the login page.
PASS_RESET_DESC_FAIL: Due to an error, we could not change your password, try again later.
WHO_ARE_ALUMNI_DESC: An alumnus or an alumna  of a college, university, or other school is a former student who has either attended or graduated in some fashion from the institution.
BIVSI_STUDENT_TEXT: Graduates or bachelors in a particular university higher education.
CILJ_TEXT: Promoting activities to help the institution of higher education, as a form of respect for all formations assigned to them while they were students of that university.
ZAJEDNICA_TEXT: Strengthening ties between the home University and generations of former and current students as well as their friends in the country and the world.
JOIN_TEXT: Do you want to join the Alumni association and participate? Join now.
ISTAKNUTE_OBAVIJESTI_DESC: The Alumni community is constantly growing, so stay tuned for the lastest news.
GOOGLE_RETRY_OAUTH: If you want, you can try to register with Google again, or continue with the standard registration process.
GOOGLE_DATA_LOADED: Your Google Account information has been successfully added.
NETWORK_ERR: We seem to have an error trying to connect to our service. We are extremely sorry for this.
STD:CHECK_INTERNET_OR_VPN: Please check your internet connection or VPN to use this application normally.
NO_SELECT_KATEGORIJA: Select a category to view related notifications.
OBJAVA_DESC: The notification will be visible on the date of publication
BRISANJE_KATEGORIJE_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete category
DELETE_HEADER: Are you sure you want to delete
DELETE_OBAVIJEST: If you do proceed, remember that there is no going back! The notification will be GONE forever!
CHANGE_OBAVIJEST_STATUS_DESC_PUBLISH: If you do proceed, this notification will be visible to everyone!
CHANGE_OBAVIJEST_STATUS_DESC_UNPUBLISH: If you do proceed, this notification will be ONLY visible to you!
CHANGE_OBAVIJEST_STATUS_HEADER: Are you sure you want to change the publication status of
TKO_SU_NASI_CLANOVI_DESC: Our members include students, alumni and professors. Try to find out more about a particular person down below.
ALUMNI_DESC: An alumnus or an alumna  of a college, university, or other school is a former student who has either attended or graduated in some fashion from the institution.
STUDENTI_DESC: A person who studies a specific subject at a form of unity government school, college, university, academy or other approved education facility.
PROFESORI_DESC: A teacher or faculty member at a college or university.
EMPTY_PROFILE_CATEGORY: We are missing out on all the things you have accomplished and working on! Write down your accomplishments so others can see how valuable you are!
PAGE_NOT_FOUND: Oops! We could not find what you were looking for, press the 'Back' button so we can bring you back.
CHANGE_EMAIL_CONFIRM_HEADER: Are you sure you want to change your email address
CHANGE_EMAIL_CONFIRM_DESC: If you do proceed, any emails that this application will send you will be sent to your newly entered email address!
EMAIL_CHANGE_WARNING: Changing your email is risky, it is advised not to!
DELETE_DESC: If you do proceed, this action is irreversible and the item will be forever deleted!
PRIVATNOST_PODATAKA_DESC: We will hide your sensitive personal information from the public if you turn on this feature
BRISANJE_KATEGORIJE_WARN: Cannot delete category that contains subcategories!
BRISANJE_OBJAVE_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete comment?
BRISANJE_KOMENTAR_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete comment?
NO_RESULTS: Oops! We couldn't find what you were looking for, try something else!
DATUM_ISKLJUCENJE_OBAVIJEST_DESC: The notification will be visible up until the selected date
NEMA_PRILOGA_ZA_POKAZATI: There are no attachments to show!
NO_RESULTS_PREDLOSCI: No templates available! Create one a template so that you can use it to make your survey!
NO_RESULTS_ANKETE: No surveys available! Create a survey from one of your templates!
DODAJ_ANKETU_PREKO_PREDLOSKA: Declare the template a survey by clicking on the 'Publish survey' button!
NO_PREDLOZAK_YET: Fill in the necessary fields so you can create your template
QUESTION: Question
REORDER_HEADER: Are you sure you want to reorder
REORDER_DESC: If you do proceed, all unsaved changes to the question itself will be abandoned.
PITANJEOBAVEZNODANE_DESC: People who complete this survey are required to answer this question.
ANKETA_PROGLASI_HEADER: Are you sure you want to declare as a survey
ANKETA_PROGLASI_DESC: If you continue, this action is irreversible and your template will no longer be subject to change!
PREDLOZAK_PROGLASEN_ANKETOM: Congratulations, Your template is now a survey!
ANONIMNO_DESC: Everyone will be able to fill out the survey, including those without membership.
VIDLJIVO_CLANOVIMA_GRUPA_DESC: Notification will be visible to selected groups members only
PREDLOZAK_POSTA_ANKETA: Well done! Your survey is now published!
CLANSTVA_ANKETA: Select members which will be able to fill in the survey
CLANSTVA_ANKETA_DESC: Selected members will receive an email with a link through which they can fill in your survey.
ANKETA_LEAVE_HEADER: Are you sure you want to leave this survey
ANKETA_LEAVE_HEADER_DESC: If you do leave, your survey with all the answers you filled out will be discarded.
ANKETA_RJESENA: Thank you very much! Your answers have been saved successfully
ANKETA_VEC_RJESENA_HEADER: You have completed the survey before
ANKETA_VEC_RJESENA: Thank you, you have already completed this survey. We will take you to the home page now.
ANKETA_NOT_ELIGIBLE: Seems like this account is not eligible for this survey!
ANKETA_NOT_ELIGIBLE_TEXT: If you want to solve this survey, login into the mentioned account and try again.
ANKETA_NON_ANON_TEXT: This survey is not available for anonymous people, continue to login screen?
USPJEH_PRETPLATA_OTKAZANA: Your subscribtion has been successfully canceled.
ANKETA_HEADER_DESC: Here are the current surveys that you can fill out to contribute to everyone.
PREDLOSCI_MANAGE_DESC: With the template management module you can create your own template for a survey and reuse it time and time again.
ANKETE_MANAGE_DESC: With the survey management module you can create view the survey's statistics upon user's interaction.
NO_ANKETE_YET: No surveys available at the moment.
COPY_PREDLOZAK_HEADER: Are you sure you want to copy this template
COPY_PREDLOZAK_DESC: You can reuse this template and make a whole new one with all the questions this one contains!
PREDLOZAK_NEMA_PITANJA: Sorry, but you cannot make an empty survey!
AKTIVNA_ANKETA_DESC: If you declare this survey passive, users will not be able to see or complete the survey!
ANKETA_INACTIVE: This survey is inactive, so you cannot resolve it. We will take you to the home page.
PREDLOZAK_FILLED_IN: Surveys made from this template were completed
UNSUBSCRIBE_CONFIRM_DESC: Are you sure you want to cancel subscription to
NEMA_PRETPLATA: Oops! It looks like you have no subcriptions!
USERNAME_NOCHANGE: Your username is your unique identifier, and it cannot be changed.
SYNC_EDUPLAN_DESC: Are you sure you want to sync your personal data with Eduplan? This action is irreversible and all your personal info will be replaced with the data found in Eduplan!
SYNC_EDUPLAN_SUCCESS: Your personal data is now synced!
SLANJE_LINKA_TEKST: Notification link will be sent to all selected groups members
LDAPUSERNAME: Your LDAP username, so you can authenticate with your Active Directory account. (Not required)
OIB_REQ_FOR_SYNC: Your OIB is required in order to be able to unambiguously synchronize with Eduplan!
